com.buession.springboot.datasource.autoconfigure

类 DataSourceConfiguration.Hikari

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buession.springboot.datasource.autoconfigure.DataSourceConfiguration
      • com.buession.springboot.datasource.autoconfigure.DataSourceConfiguration.Hikari
  • 封闭类:
    DataSourceConfiguration

    @Configuration(proxyBeanMethods=false)
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=DataSourceProperties.class)
 @ConditionalOnClass(value=com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource.class)
 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value=DataSource.class)
 @ConditionalOnProperty(name="spring.datasource.type",
                       havingValue="com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
public static class DataSourceConfiguration.Hikari
extends DataSourceConfiguration
    Hikari DataSource Configuration.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.3.2
